name: Exotic Babies
description:
Couldn't think of a name so let atf name it ðŸ˜…

Simple yet tasty tropical mix.

Fa mango Indian special providing the bulk of the flavour, backed up with a little cap sweet mango. 

Cap golden pineapple to add to the tropical vibe, flv jackfruit used to help boost golden pineapple as its a very light flavour. 

Can also add 1.5-2% flv smoothie Base to add a little citrus taste. 

Sweetener is down to preference, leave it in take it out, its up to you.
author: Tvsty1
